amendment.description: Amendment provides for special consideration for vessels of historical significance and keeps in place the current EPA vessel discharge program for historic ferries.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 112-267 to freeze the Environmental Protection Agency's current vessel discharge regulatory framework for certain vessels of historic significance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Huizenga (MI).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga (MI) amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
